name: Halloween Your Friend
description:
If you want to pull a scary prank on your friends try this app! let them play " collecting the fruits " and a ghostly figure will pop up and make them jump in place .. Scary animated ghost HD.

DISCLAIMER
Use with discretion
Do not use with people who has / suspect to have medical conditions
Be aware that some individuals may drop the phone when they are scared .. use protective case for your mobile device.
